name: pot-protocol
description: Proof of Training (PoT) Protocol - Decentralized AI governance through consensus

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd orchestrator && npm install && cd ../rag-agent && npm install && cd ../ui && npm install && cd ../PoL-hardhat && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd orchestrator && npm run build && cd ../ui && echo 'UI has no build step'
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd orchestrator && npm run dev" "cd ui && npm start"
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd PoL-hardhat && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd PoL-hardhat && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.clean: rm -rf orchestrator/dist orchestrator/node_modules rag-agent/node_modules ui/node_modules PoL-hardhat/node_modules node_modules
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run build
